enhanced_by.reason: The isValid method can be used to validate the input code before calculating the check digit, ensuring the code is either 9 or 12 characters long.
Both methods calculate a check digit for ISBN codes, and the output of ISBN10_CHECK_DIGIT.calculate can be used to assert the correctness of the calculate method when the input length is 9.
Both methods calculate a check digit for ISBN codes, and the output of ISBN13_CHECK_DIGIT.calculate can be used to assert the correctness of the calculate method when the input length is 12.
